title: Firefox sometimes closses by itself
content: I use Firefox 107.0 (64-bit) on a Windows laptop. Recently, the browser closes on its own. when I restart Firefox all my previous tabs have been closed.
creator: crl4242

title: Website firewall
content:

title: BING POP UP AS DEFAULT BROWSER.
content: WHY BING POP UP ALL THE TIME WHEN I HAVE FIREFOX AS MY DEFAULT BROWER??? ANY HELP!!!!
creator: SANTI.ORTIZ

title: Google Docs editor broken
content:
The last couple of days the Google Docs editor is semi-broken. Specifically, most of the tabs near the top have no text in them. They're just white boxes.

On the other hand, I can type text into the editor as normal.

The problem does not occur in Chromium-based browsers such as Chrome and Brave.

I'm working with Firefox on Windows, and Firefox reports it's up to date.

I've attached a cropped screenshot showing the problem.
creator: john558

title: Twitter Video Streaming in Firefox is Terrible
content: Twitter Video Streaming in Firefox on an older computer (Windows 7) does not work. The videos don't play (just audio). I logged into my same Twitter account on Chrome on the same computer and Twitter video streaming worked perfectly. Please fix the disparity.
creator: brookse321
